column4: Hey guys, how does XMMS stack up feature-wise against amaroK?
do you still have access to the partition?  you can back up your mozilla profile and probably the other things too

I'm on it right now.  I'm burning the 32bit Live CD as we type.  I don't think backing it up will really work, though, now that I think about it, because so many things are specifically written for 64bit.
stuff in the mozilla profile is?  hmm if that's the case then I dunno sorry
